DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of YH23537 versus celebrex in patients with knee osteoarthritis.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial of YH23537 in Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Signed Informed Consent Men and women â‰¥ 40 years of age Patients with knee osteoarthritis at one or both knee by ACR Patients with known or suspected secondary knee osteoarthritis Other exclusions applied
